Source.Name: nano
Source.Summary: Small, friendly text editor inspired by Pico
Source.Description: GNU nano is an easy-to-use text editor originally designed as a replacement for Pico, the ncurses-based editor from the non-free mailer package Pine (itself now available under the Apache License as Alpine).
